channel.title: Pedro's Tech Blog
channel.description: A blog about many things, all tech and software related.

item.title: Streaming HTML responses
item.description: How does HTML chunking work when streaming HTML files to the browser?
item.content:encoded: How does HTML chunking work when streaming HTML files to the browser?
item.author: pfernandom@gmail.com (Pedro Marquez)

item.title: Weird behavior for matrix created with Array.fill()
item.description: I tried to initialize a two-dimension array with Array.fill() and now weird stuff is happening when I use it. Why??
item.content:encoded: I tried to initialize a two-dimension array with Array.fill() and now weird stuff is happening when I use it. Why??
item.author: pfernandom@gmail.com (Pedro Marquez)

item.title: What happens when you click on the browser's "back" button?
item.description: What exactly happens to your web application when a user clicks on their browser's back button?
item.content:encoded: What exactly happens to your web application when a user clicks on their browser's back button?
item.author: pfernandom@gmail.com (Pedro Marquez)

item.title: The wonderful world of component-based development

item.title: Managing state in Flutter apps with data streaming
